EmailTemplate.name: Shop.org 2016 Pre-event Info- 1320.ACQ: Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Attending Shop.org? We have a big offer for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for work and play in beautiful Texas, y’all. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We wanted to let you know about our Big Austin Experience <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/bigaustin?utm_medium=event&utm_source=shop16]]>, an exclusive offer for Shop.org attendees. Stop by our booth during the show to be eligible to receive:
- Up to 6 months’ complimentary subscription - Up to $2,000 credit for migration and onboarding services - Airfare for 2 and 2-night hotel stay in Austin - Fine dining, live music and (of course) barbecue - Meetings with top executives at BigCommerce HQ
Learn more <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/bigaustin?utm_medium=event&utm_source=shop16]]>
Visit BigCommerce at booth #4025 to get more details and requirements for this offer.
Kind regards, The BigCommerce Team sellmore@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:sellmore@bigcommerce.com]]> / 1-855-884-6610 <[[tel:18558846610]]>
